articles.author: Matt Simon
articles.title: AI Magic Makes Century-Old Films Look New
articles.description: Denis Shiryaev uses algorithms to colorize and sharpen old movies, bumping them up to a smooth 60 frames per second. The result is a stunning glimpse at the past.
